alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wallace, northern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties through 530 PM MDT/630 PM CDT/... At 457 PM MDT/557 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Wallace to 11 miles southwest of Russell Springs. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russell Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
